description:
The company holds its 36th meeting on cost reduction with Big Cat, Lizard and other members of the board. Toucan, however, gets into an unfortunate accident.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Africa Job Search / Africa Cost Reduction / Africa Job Hunting 2 / Africa High-School Girls: Right?
Africa no Shuukatsu / Africa no Cost Sakugen / Africa no Shuukatsu 2 / Africa no JK: Deshou ne
アフリカの就活 / アフリカのコスト削減 / アフリカの就活② / アフリカのJK~でしょーね~
